fact: I found this awesome Youtube channel called Drumeo - and they have a sequence of videos where famous drummers listen to pop songs (that they've likely not heard of) and form their own drum sequences. It's crazy because it makes you realize a change in percussion can change the entire context of the song! Here's one of their videos - Megadeth's drummer forms his own sequence to Mr. Brightside.

I tried out my first Waymo ride - and it was unreal. The end to end experience was something out of the future, and it was particularly cool to see the Waymo handle an edge case when the car in front was backing up in traffic. If it isn't already - this might be one of the Bay Area's most exciting attractions!
